name: CLSBinaryItem
desc: Activity information that is true or false, pass or fail, yes or no.

items.name: init(identifier: String, title: String, type: CLSBinaryValueType)
items.desc: Initializes a new binary activity item of the given type.

items.name: enum CLSBinaryValueType
items.desc: The kinds of outcomes that a binary activity item can represent.

items.name: var value: Bool
items.desc: The value that the binary activity item takes.

items.name: var valueType: CLSBinaryValueType
items.desc: The kind of outcome that the binary activity item represents.
